---
title: "Binary function transfer analyses"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
t2s = c("X0", "XOR", "XOR_of_XORs", "NXOR", "AND")
num_runs = 40

d = data.frame()
for (run in 0:(num_runs-1)) {
  for (t2 in t2s) {
    this_d = read.csv(sprintf("results/t2%s_run%i.csv", t2, run), header=T)
    this_d$t2 = t2
    this_d$run = run
    d = bind_rows(d, this_d)
  }
  
}
```

```{r}
summarized_d = d %>% 
  group_by(t2, epoch) %>%
  summarize(sd_loss1 = sd(loss1),
            loss1 = mean(loss1),
            sd_loss2 = sd(loss2),
            loss2 = mean(loss2))
```

```{r}
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r}
ggplot(summarized_d, aes(x=epoch, y=loss1, color=t2)) + 
  geom_line() +
  geom_line(aes(group=interaction(run,t2)), data=d, alpha=0.1)
```
